instructions:
Sauté in olive oil as follows: celery for 3 minutes, add green pepper and continue sautéing for 3 minutes,
add onion and continue sautéing for additional 6 minutes. Add tomatoes and seasonings. Simmer lightly for
4 minutes. Dissolve cornstarch in 2 tablespoons of water and add to tomatoes. Cook for a minute. Remove
bay leaf, cool and freeze in containers. Makes 2 quarts.
ingredients: 1/2 envelope G Washington Brown seasoning mix
name: Stewed Tomatoes
creator: Mary Decker
